column1: length on middle, tucked away straight to short fine-leg, missed out on a boundary opportunity there
length on the pads, again, Lynn rigidly tries to work it to the leg side, misses and is struck on the thigh pad
length on off, shape away from the batsman, Lynn tries to drag it on the pull but is early into the stroke and there isn't enough bounce either
length on the pads, struck on the thigh pad as he tries to tuck it away towards squareleg, they scamper a single
length on the pads, pushed wide of mid-on, they take off for a quick single, the fielder has a go at the non striker's, and the ricochet off the bat changes direction and races away for overthrows
Gone! Lynn early into the pull shot again, it was a straight delivery on a length, did not rise at all and struck Lynn in front. Not a pitch to play across the line and Lynn pays the price
full outside off, the top spinner, Narine swings across the line, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
nearly another one! Harbhajan shortens his length, slows it up a little, Narine still has a go and ends up slicing it in the air between point and cover-point
length on middle, quicker and flatter to the right hander, pushed down to long-on
length outside off, Narine makes room and tries to blast it through the covers and misses

another one bites the dust! Both openers gone! Harbhajan tosses it up, teasing Narine on a pitch offering him considerable help, Narine tries to slog him into oblivion, only managing a top edge, high in the air towards point, who had to run back and dive to his left to complete an excellent catch
length on the pads, pushed to midwicket
length on off, angles the bat and defends to point
length on middle, rocks back and defends it back to the bowler
length and down the leg side, called wide as Rana misses the flick

another unwarranted stroke and that's the third KKR wicket! Length on middle, he goes for the pull shot, it keeps a tad low again, skids onto Rana as well, who only manages to toe-end it to midwicket, where Rayudu takes a neat catch diving forward
length outside off, hint of shape away, let through to the keeper
length outside off, has a tentative poke at it from the crease, the hint of movement away beats the outside edge
full outside off, nice stride forward and defended to cover-point
full outside off, pushed to long-off
tossed up outside off, draws him forward, Karthik goes for the drive and gets a thick outside edge to point
edged and four down to third-man!
length outside off, punched to deep cover
full on the pads, pushed to mid-on
full outside off, driven past the diving cover, down to long-off for one
short outside off and that's the first shot of authority, slashed away between point and cover-point
short and this time it's a little too short and Uthappa can rock back, control the stroke even as it keeps a tad low and lift it over midwicket and down to the boundary
full on middle, drilled back to the bowler, and the non striker, who was backing up could have been in a spot of bother

that's the third wicket to the cross batted pull! Chahar on the charge in the Power-play again. The shot hasn't been on tonight, this was a slower short ball, bounced a little extra, caught him on the splice and went high up in the air towards deep squareleg, who eventually had to put in a dive forward to take it
length on middle, defended
full on off, Karthik comes forward and defends to cover
full on off, pushed to long-off
short outside off, Karthik picks the length early, rocks back and bisects point and short third-man
full outside off, defended
full on middle, defended
full outside off, slower in pace, Karthik tries to blast it through the covers but finds the man without any timinbg
length outside off, punched to cover-point
length outside off, angles the bat and pushes it straight to point
full outside off, comes forward and pushes it mid-off and takes off for the quick single and makes it
length on the pads, clipped away nicely to deep squareleg's right and they get through for two
length outside off, extra bounce as Karthik tries to steer it to third-man, gets it on the splice and it trickles away to point
length on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
length on off, Karthik goes deep in his crease and taps it on the of side
tossed up on off, Karthik comes forward and across, works it around with his wrists towards squareleg for one
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
quicker and flatter on middle, pushed back to the bowler
length on middle, he rocks back, uses the depth of the crease before using his wrists to turn it around with the spin towards fine-leg for two
length on off, top spinner this time, tries to push it to mid-on, a little early into the shot and gets a thick inside edge down to deep squareleg
quicker one the pads, pushed to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, slightly overpitched, driven to the left of long-off for a couple
full on the legs, Karthik goes down on one knee and tickles it really really fine for a cheeky boundary

That's the big fish, the captain, who was looking good so far! It was full on middle, Karthik whipped it nicely, taking it from the stumps, hit it flat and hard but aerially and straight to midwicket, where Harbhajan clung onto a sharp chance. He probably wanted to clear the man and would have had four, instead it's half the side back in the hut
googly, tossed up outside off, Russell lunges forward, smothers the spin and defends with bat and pad close
length outside off, straighter one, Russell shoulders arms in anticlimactic fashion
length outside off, bit of width on off, Gill chops it away past the diving point fielder for two
full on off, driven to long-off
length, quicker and flatter on the pads, rocks back and defends
length on off, slower, Russell waits for it and pushes to point
beauty! pitches middle, turns square, beats the outside edge with vicious turn away
length on middle, turn and bounce for Jadeja again, Russell wait for it this time, is squared up a little, but defends safely in the end

got him! Tahir sneaks through Gill with a googly. He falls over trying to flick without a big stride. It slips through between inside edge and leg, Dhoni picks it up and takes the bails off. It doesn't even need to be sent upstairs. It's going downhill FAST for KKR
length on middle stump, stays deep in the crease and pushes it back down the pitch
length outside off, driven straight to extra cover
full googly in the corridor, gets low and sweeps to long leg
full outside off, looks to drill through the covers. Gets it down to long-off
stumping appeal sent upstairs. Googly tossed up outside off. Chawla beaten on the drive. Foot went up briefly...but is just back in. He survives.
length at middle stump, gets on the back foot and pokes to midwicket
strike one! Russell will be delighted at the ball coming into him. This is at a length on middle, slightly flat. Uses his reach and creams the slog sweep over the midwicket zone
flat, short of a length on middle stump. Flicked into the open leg side
length outside off, leans in and defends to backward point
tossed up wide outside off, opens the face and runs this to backward point
full outside off, languidly leans in and drives to extra cover
length ball, sliding through in the corridor. Hurriedly punched into the covers

dropped! Harbhajan has lost the trajectory in the night sky and has ended up having to lunge backwards after getting under this at midwicket! A floated legbreak from Tahir, Russell looks for the slog sweep and top edges. He looks into the floor immediately - what have I done? - but he survives. Will that haunt CSK all evening?
short of a length on middle stump, punched to deep midwicket off the back foot
see ya! Length ball tossed up outside off and Piyush Chawla is all swag here - a cap, a stride, a big swing and big six over midwicket
slider from a length across off stump, looks for the late cut, beaten
short of a length outside off, opens his stance and taps this to mid-off
bouncer and he ducks under this. Not a quick pitch, picks the length early and lets it go

Jadeja jumps and keeps this in at deep midwicket. Short ball. Russell hooks and miscues. Jadeja runs to his right and recognises that he might not be in control if he goes with both hands to catch this. So he gets his left hand across and pushes this in from in front of his right shoulder like a goalkeeper. Superb dexterity
length on leg stump, flicked to fine leg

another mis-hit but this one is safely between deep square and deep midwicket. Length ball coming in at leg stump. Backs away and swipes hard at this. It comes off the low part of the bat and the inside half
length and into his body as he backs into the leg side. Hurriedly defends pitch side on the off side and steals the single
length and just outside off, driven back to the bowler
full on off stump, driven firmly towards long-on. Tahir dives and stops one-handed
get out of the way! No way Tahir is sticking his hand out at this. Backs away, meets it as a full toss and drills it to his left. Not even long-off can come close to that
oh loooopy. Tahir lobs it right up, gets it to dip on a length just outside off. Russell almost falls for it - sets up for the sweep, but lets it go

they've reviewed an lbw decision, have CSK. This is a legbreak that has hit Russell in front of middle as he looks to flick with a short stride. Spinning a long way though. Is there bat on it? Tiny murmur on UltraEdge...but that is not bat deems the umpire. But that's okay for Russell. It's spinning past off stump. CSK lose the review. Dhoni was sheepish when he took that, he was taking a chance on it.
length outside off, leans in, drives to long-off
slugged to deep midwicket. Harbhajan is nervous now. He bowls slowly normally, it's how he got Narine. This is at a length and pushed through fast outside off
tossed up at a length from around the wicket. Chawla leans in and tries to stab through cover, but this hasn't turned enough for him to get the shot away. Down the pitch off the inside half

goes slow again and gets him out by a long, long way. That's more like the Harbhajan this season. Gets it to dip and spin a long way away from just short of a length. Chawla is down the pitch and swatting all around this. Runs straight off, doesn't even bother trying to get back

and another. Oh this is poor. Length outside off, dipping, drawing him forward. Kuldeep into a lazy front foot poke. Thick edge past slip. Russell takes for the run. Kuldeep is still trying to get up as backward point picks up and puts in quite a bad throw at the other end. Harbhajan has to lunge and hold on, then recover to flick this onto the stumps. And he does what's required
short of a length, flat outside off. Backs away for the pull but this skids on fast. Back to the bowler off the under-edge
in the air but safely in front of deep midwicket. A full toss that he can't get hold of with the slog. Once again done by the extra pace
short and spinning a long long way past the wide marker outside off. Looks to pull, can't come close
misfield by Tahir at backward point. Probably a lot of the Chennai public calling that 'idea fielding' now. It gets Russell off strike. A powerful cut at a short ball
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
straight to midwicket. Tame. Full and dipping on leg stump. Prasidh looks to flick with hard hands. Can't do that on a slow pitch. Harbhajan has no problem holding onto this one
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
swats it to the midwicket boundary. Slower ball at a length outside off, crouches and gets this slog along the floor between deep midwicket and long-on
and he bowls short and wide outside off. That's not prudent from the bowler. Lucky that cover dives on top of this cut - looks like Watson - and manages to parry it keep it to two
short of a length, into the body. Pulls to deep square, doesn't run
short and down leg side. Russell gets out of the line with an arched back
short ball at the stumps, backs away and pulls into the turf to find that midwicket fielder who came in after the first ball. Wonder if he could have backed away and got this over the off side
short of a length and skidding in at an off stump line. Looks to cut, but is late on it. Ends up bunting it to extra cover's right off the inside half. Takes the run this time
crafty late cut down to third man, and on another day, Gurney would have got the chance to celebrate that with a run. Tonight, he stays still. Short ball in the corridor from the bowler
length ball slanted in at middle stump. A juicy length ball to slog on most surfaces. Here he can only manage to drag this out to long-on
full and just outside off, looks to drill it straight again. Miscued again. Thick inside edge to short fine's left

just clears Jadeja at long-on! Oh boy, that didn't look like it had traveled the distance when he first hit it. Attempted slog at a short of a length ball, on the front foot, off the bottom of the bat. Jadeja has run in rather than along the rope and this has just cleared him. Out if he was on the line
full outside off, puts everything into this attempted drive on the off side, but it's mistimed again. Along the floor to long-off
slower bouncer wide outside off, jumps up and looks to slap it behind square. Beaten

beaten. Russell doesn't look for the single. Short ball outside off, looks to smoke it into the leg side with a pull but misses. He is exhausted. Possibly has a cramp in his left wrist as well. It's hard trying to hit with that force on this pitch, takes a real toll
shot! You beauty, Gurney. A classy looking chip to sweeper cover. Short ball in the corridor, makes room and slices. He can settle in at the other end till the end of the innings now
pulled to deep square's right and they won't run. Short ball at the ribs, doesn't get all of this with the pull

this will go! Short ball at leg stump, backs away, deep into the crease and swats this over the midwicket boundary! And clutches his forearm immediately. That cramp is acting up. Takes serious hitting on this pitch to clear the boundary

slower short ball is clobbered! WOW! Tremendous hit. Unbelievable strength. Short, dipping at middle. Squats under it and whacks it at deep square. He takes one step to his left and the ball has already reached him on the bounce. He sticks out a hand to try and stop it, but the ball has already ricocheted off him and into the boundary padding
full toss and he misses out. Low and wide outside off, a misses yorker. Which is why not a lot of bowlers go with that option against him. But his drives is mistimed, straight to extra cover

squeezed past long-off and that's fifty! Short of a length in the corridor again. Stays still and chucks his hands at this. It comes off the toe-end and floats past the bowler. Long-off sprints to his right and puts in a dive, but it dribbles into the boundary
full outside off, overpitched and drilled through extra cover for four
googly outside off, Watson picks it and drags it down to long-on's right, times it well but the fielder gets around it, puts in the slide and hurls the throw back to keep it to two
quicker and flatter outside off, looks to cut but it's too full for the stroke and there's no room either
slower on middle, he tries to flick it to the on side, turns the face of the bat too early and the leading edge nearly carries back to the bowler
killing the chase early here Watson! Short on middle, rocks back and hammers a pull over deep midwicket
length on middle, pushed to mid-on
beaten! Length outside off, du Plessis has a flash with his feet rooted to the crease and misses
lift from the wicket there and beats the bat again! Banged into the surface, quick delivery, du Plessis surprised by thye extra bounce, nearly gloves it behind
length outside off, steered to third-man
length outside off, steered to point's left and they scamper one
full on the pads, du Plessis misses the flick shot and gets an inside edge back on to the pad
length on middle, Watson makes room and punches it through the covers, not trying to hit it too hard, just times it and it races to the fence
short on middle and he hammers a pull flat and hard, picking out squareleg in the circle. Watson is livid but he has to go
length outside off, appreciable turn away, Raina pushes it to cover
full on off, it's slightly overpitched and Raina doesn't have to worry about raging turn, it's that full, launches it straight down the ground with a lovely bat swing
length on middle, doesn't bounce much, Raina controls the pull along the ground towards squareleg
length on off, de Plessis goes right back and defends safely
length on the pads, clipped away to fine-leg's right for a couple
length on off, banged hard into the surface, doesn't rise much as Raina jumps right back and defends tentatively
another one banged into the surface, around the hip this time, doesn't rise much either as Raina tries to turn it around towards fine-leg but doesn't make any contact with the bat
length on middle, Raina backs away this time and just guides it over the cover-field, the timing is excellent and it races to the fence
length outside off, steered to third-man
length on middle, nudged away to squareleg
length on middle, du Plessis shuffles across and tucks it away towards deep backward squareleg
length on middle, Raina waits for it and taps it to cover
short on off, hint of turn away, Raina goes for the pull, doesn't time it too well and mid-on dives to his right and keeps him on strike
short on middle, sticks in the surface and Raina can't time another pull

Raina's been living dangerously and he skies this one high in the air and is taken brilliantly by Piyush Chawla, who runbs back from mid-on and puts in a timely dive to catch it inches from the ground! It was tossed up on middle, stuck in the surface a little as Raina went for an ugly slog, only managing a top edge
length outside off, pushed to point
lift from the surface again and just eludes Rayudu's gloves as he pokes at it tentatively
length outside off, not much bounce this time, Rayudu lets it through to the keeper
no-ball and Rayudu, yet to get off the mark gets a free hit! Length on off, defended to cover but here's his opportunity to cash in
slower ball on middle, rocks back to pull, gets it over midwicket and into the boundary
length on off, defended to cover
length outside off, steered to point
googly on off, defended to point
full on off, comes forward and pushes it to long-off
length on middle, Rayudu goes back and tucks it away to deep squareleg
overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
full on the pads, comes forward, smothers the spin and pushes it to midwicket

full outside off, beautifully tossed up, spins back into Rayudu as he lunges forward and is struck on the front pad, but clearly outside the line as the stifled appeal from the keeper is promptly turned down
length outside off, du Plessis goes down on one knee and ramps it over the keeper for two
turns square and beats the edge! That's vicious turn from middle stump as he tries to turn it to the leg side and actually gets a feather on it but the keeper can't collect it cleanly
full outside off, goes for the sweep and misses
length outside off, pushed to cover without any timing
googly, flat outside off, du Plesis picks it and nails the sweep along the ground, straight to deep squareleg
full on off, comes forward and defends to cover
short outside off, poor bowling, cut away hard and along the ground to deep cover's left
full outside off, pushed to long-off
full on off, pushed back to the bowler
full on off, drags it along the ground to midwicket
full outside off, pushed to long-off
googly on middle, Rayudu watches it from the pitch, hangs back and defends towards point
length, angled in, du Plessis shuffles and tucks it around towards squareleg
slower ball outside off, lunges forward and defends to point
short on middle, helps it around to deep squareleg with the angle
slower ball, angled away, pushed to deep cover
length outside off, hint of room, Rayudu rocks back and chops it away past point's right and the timing takes it all the way to the fence
length on middle, tucked away to deep squareleg
tossed up full on off stump, allows it to land and jams it out to extra cover
googly at a length on off stump, defended to extra cover
full and just outside off. Drives against the turn, can't beat Gill's dive to the right at extra cover
full and loopy on off stump, allows it to come on, gets the front leg out of the way, and drives to long-off
shot! Finds the gap expertly. Slightly flatter from Kuleep and at a length outside off. Nice, big stride forward and he gets this sweep sweetly to long-on's right
leading edge as he closes the face too soon. Not sure that was the googly, might have just gone through with the flick too early. Single through cover
length and flat, 95kph, at off stump. Comfortably on the back foot to punch this to long-on
short of a length on leg stump, clipped to short fine's left and Faf is ball-watching and static during what looks an easy run
length outside off, leans in and drives to sweeper's right
length on leg stump, gets on the back foot and flicks to deep square
short of a length in the corridor, punched to sweeper off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
length and into the pads. Skids straight on. Onto the back foot to flick this to long leg
length on off stump, driven to long-off with the turn
short of a length, looked like a googly out of the hand. But once again, just skidding straight on. Backs away to punch to sweeper cover, gets it off the inside half to cover's left
googly, turns in a big way as he goes wide of the crease this time. But it's picked, opens the face and runs this to short third
length just outside off, defended to extra cover off the back foot
length outside off, gets the front leg across and flicks to midwicket's right
googly, short and turning away outside off. Looks to punch with no feet. It comes back to the bowler off the toe-end
oh nice shot. Googly at a length outside off, allows it to land and opens the face late as he drives this to long-off's left. Just the perfect timing to pick up a second
short of a length just outside off, on the back foot, hurriedly poked through cover
length at off stump,gets on the back foot, tapped back to the bowler
googly, short and wide. Gets deep in the crease and cuts to sweeper cover. 71.6kph that ball
full on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket

dropped! That catching fielder gets Rayudu to try and go above the infield. But there's been a ball change in the interval and this one grips and spins away from his inside-out shot. He slices it up towards Prasidh who runs in and slides on his knees as he puts this down from in front of his chest and loses balance
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length in the corridor, pushed to point's right off the back foot

won't survive this time! Length at off stump, looks to sweep, gets a top edge and Rana settles under it from short extra. A few steps to his left and holds on. And a big noise from the crowd - as if it's KKR's home ground.

casually lifts it one bounce over the long-off boundary! What does it mean to get settled? Length ball outside off, probably a googly too. Half a stride, beautiful hands, nice timing as he goes inside-out
length on off stump, dead-batted into the off side on the front foot
length on off stump, dropped in front of point with soft hands
short of a length just outside off, pulled along the floor to deep square

nicely timed but sweeper cover cleans up to his left. Prasidh with the perfect amount of pace to play some strokes. Gets a short ball to climb in the corridor and Faf springs up and gets his weight into this cut shot
low full toss just outside off, drives it to sweeper's right
full on off stump, driven firmly back down the pitch and at the bowler
leading edge but it results in two. Length at off stump, defends inside the line and this pings off the outer part of the bat, past point
offcutter at a length on off stump, from around the wicket. Defended into the covers
slower short ball headed down leg. Looks for the pull and is through it early. Cops it on the forearm
length at leg stump, looks to flick and cops it on the pad off the inside edge. They steal a single.It's a massive no-ball

scythes it over extra cover. Low full toss just outside off, stays inside the line, opens the face late and gets it to the boundary. That ball probably explains why Gurney hasn't bowled a lot tonight - he's having trouble gripping it
nicely done. Been a neat little innings of class from Faf tonight. Short ball down leg side. Allows it to skid on and helps it past short fine with a pull
slower ball at middle stump, looks to lift it over the off side, gets it off the inside half to deep square
full on leg stump, leans in for the flick to deep backward square
length and turning into middle stump. Stays deep in the crease and pushes to extra cover's left
lbw shout as this rips back in sharply. Faf with the front leg planted across for a flick. That's turning past leg stump
and this one is definitely turning past leg, also both of DK's legs. Pitches outside leg, turns a long way down and trickles towards the CSK dugout
